original_text: Israel's people have become God's enemies, because they have refused to believe the good news about Christ. This has happened to help you Gentiles. But God still loves Israel's people, because he has chosen them as his own people. That is what he promised to their ancestors. Israel's people have become God's enemies, because they have refused to believe the good news about Christ. This has happened to help you Gentiles. But God still loves Israel's people, because he has chosen them as his own people. That is what he promised to their ancestors.
korean_text: 복음으로 하면 그들이 너희로 말미암아 원수 된 자요 택하심으로 하면 조상들로 말미암아 사랑을 입은 자라

sentences.original_text: Israel's people have become God's enemies
because they have refused to believe the good news about Christ
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그리스도에 대한 복음을 믿기를 거절했기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: This has happened to help you Gentiles
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 당신 이방인들을 돕기 위해 일어난 일입니다

sentences.original_text: But God still loves Israel's people
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 하나님은 여전히 이스라엘 백성을 사랑하십니다

sentences.original_text: because he has chosen them as his own people
sentences.korean_translation: 그분께서 그들을 자신의 백성으로 선택하셨기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: That is what he promised to their ancestors
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그분께서 그들의 조상에게 약속하신 것입니다
